price: E, se quiséssemos, apagar-Ihes-íamos os olhos, então, precipitar-se-iam na senda; como poderiam, pois, enxergar algo?
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu laṭamasnā ʿalā aʿyunihim fa-is'tabaqū al-ṣirāṭa fa-annā yub'ṣirūna
